SELECT rc.recruit_name AS recruitName, ci.company_name AS companyName, jm.job_midindex_name AS jobMidindexName, rcj.recruit_job_cd AS recruitJobCd, rcj.recruit_job_jobdetail AS recruitJobJobdetail, rcj.recruit_job_education AS recruitJobEducation, rcj.recruit_job_workstatus AS recruitJobWorkstatus, rc.recruit_enddate AS recruitEnddate FROM tb_recruit_company rc
INNER JOIN tb_recruit_company_job rcj ON rc.recruit_company_cd = rcj.recruit_company_cd
INNER JOIN tb_company_info ci ON rc.company_cd = ci.company_cd
INNER JOIN tb_job_midindex jm ON rcj.job_midindex_cd = jm.job_midindex_cd
WHERE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP <= rc.recruit_enddate ORDER BY rc.recruit_enddate ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT COUNT(*) AS myRecruitBookmarkCount FROM tb_recruit_company_bookmark WHERE login_id = #{loginId};

SELECT cm.m_cletter_cd AS mCletterCd, cm.recruit_job_cd AS recruitJobCd, cm.login_id AS loginId, cm.m_cletter_name AS mCletterName, cm.m_cletter_regdate AS mCletterRegdate, cm.m_cletter_modidate AS mCletterModidate FROM tb_cletter_member cm WHERE cm.login_id = #{loginId}

SELECT rc.recruit_name AS recruitName, ci.company_name AS companyName, jm.job_midindex_name AS jobMidindexName, rcj.recruit_job_cd AS recruitJobCd, rcj.recruit_job_jobdetail AS recruitJobJobdetail, rcj.recruit_job_education AS recruitJobEducation, rcj.recruit_job_workstatus AS recruitJobWorkstatus, rc.recruit_enddate AS recruitEnddate FROM tb_recruit_company rc
INNER JOIN tb_recruit_company_job rcj ON rc.recruit_company_cd = rcj.recruit_company_cd
INNER JOIN tb_company_info ci ON rc.company_cd = ci.company_cd
INNER JOIN tb_job_midindex jm ON rcj.job_midindex_cd = jm.job_midindex_cd
ORDER BY rc.recruit_enddate ASC

SELECT rcj.recruit_job_cd AS recruitJobCd, ci.company_name AS companyName, rc.recruit_name AS recruitName, jm.job_midindex_name AS jobMidindexName, rcj.recruit_job_jobdetail AS recruitJobJobdetail, DATE_FORMAT(rc.recruit_enddate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as recruitEnddate FROM tb_recruit_company rc
INNER JOIN tb_recruit_company_job rcj ON rc.company_cd = rcj.company_cd
INNER JOIN tb_job_midindex jm ON rcj.job_midindex_cd = jm.job_midindex_cd

WHERE rcj.recruit_job_cd = #{recruitJobCd}
